### Strategic Position:
With this audit complete, Best of Goa is **ready to compete** with bestdubai.com. The content quality is high, the data is accurate, and the SEO foundation is solid. The primary blocker is **publication status** - once restaurants go live, the platform will have 800 high-quality listings across 6 major categories.
